nodes.text: Bado Karpa was a male Aqualish who worked for Meeko Ghintee during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He was wanted by Rozatta for stealing her fuel cell shipments. In 32 BBY, his bounty was worth 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 credits dead, and was claimed by the Mandalorian Bounty hunter Jango Fett on Outland Transit Station.
